name: The Salvation Army Kroc Community Center
description: Kroc Community Center (KCC) provides activities for all ages, including summer camps and after school activities for youth, a women's group, and a senior center that serves meals. It is comprised of five major components: a Center of Worship, an Education Center, a Fitness and Recreation Center, and Special Event Facilities. KCC houses an array of education, sports, faith, arts and supportive programs. The programs, as well as the building itself, have been designed to stimulate the mind, body,
